text: I had a great experience getting my teeth cleaned at Raffles Dental. Dr. Sean Lee is very knowledgable and skilled but moreover has excellent bedside manner and was extremely attentive and reassuring throughout my visit. Definitely recommend!

I had a pleasant dental cleaning experience with Dr. Sean Lee recently. As someone who has always been apprehensive about dental visits due to a fear of pain, I was especially relieved by the professional care I received.

Dr. Sean Lee was incredibly understanding of my concerns. He explained each step clearly and made sure I was comfortable throughout. I was impressed by his gentle approach, which made the entire experience far less stressful than I anticipated. The use of numbing agents ensured I didnâ€™t feel any pain, which was a major relief.

I highly recommend Dr. Sean Lee for anyone who shares similar anxieties.

Two weeks ago, I went to Raffles Dental to get a replacement for my retainer and picked it up a week later. However, the retainer never fit properly. The orthodontist who helped me put it on didnâ€™t give me any time to check the fit or test it by biting down.

After wearing it for two nights, I realized it was uncomfortable and not fitting right, so I called back to ask for help. Unfortunately, Raffles Dental informed me that I would be charged againâ€”as if I were a new patient. Disappointed, I ended up contacting my original orthodontist in California and asked them to ship me a new set instead.

The cost at Raffles Dental wasn't cheap. I paid S$500 for the retainer, which included consumables and two visits.
In the end, I see that S$500 as expensive tuition for a hard lesson learned.
Thank you Dr. Sean, for the great experience and professionalism! Every detail was explained thoroughly, making the process smooth and informative.

Good dentists but experience really spoilt by very poor customer service. Appointment at 8.30am but no one is at the counter. Previously, I had problems changing an appointment as no one was picking up the phone. I later found out that the staff put the phones on silent. ðŸ™„
